about_the_game:
Become a card designer and create cards from scratch! From spells to minions, you can select and bring to life your perfect card including its attack and resistance, the effects, and even activation conditions and timing of their abilities!

Random generation & Roguelike elements

Every card in Card Artisan past your starter deck as well as every card in your enemies' decks is randomly generated. This in addition to a randomly generated map results in no two runs being the same!

The game features 80 unique pieces of equipment that will shake up your runs with all sorts of abilities that will test your creativity and challenge your ability to find new kinds of decks and strategies! 

Meta progression

Win or lose, every run will give you experience that you can invest to strengthen your heroes and ensure you have a better chance at winning on your next attempt!

Card Artisan also features easy-to-use integrated tools to create your own mods or download and use community-made mods. You can easily modify a variety of visuals from the art cards will have, to the cutscene images and text, to details such as words that will be utilized when randomizing a card with that art to have the randomly generated card name match the visual details or lore of the card!

Difficulty progression

Every run you complete unlocks a new difficulty level that will add new challenges and increase the power of your enemies' decks, and how well they play their cards!

Card Artisan features 4 main classes with their own unique class abilities and strategies, and a additional 10 class variants you can unlock that have their own starting decks, starting equipment, and refined strategies 

High power level

Since Card Artisan is a single-player experience, you will be able to pull-off all sorts of powerful card combos and ridiculous strategies, but beware, your enemies will match your might in the higher difficulty levels!

Free-battle mode

If you just want to remove all limitations and focus in creating the perfect deck of cards, you can revisit and improve decks from past runs or start from scratch in the Free-battle mode where you will have access to not only unlimited crafting materials, but also every piece of equipment you've encountered in regular gameplay to mix and match powerful and unique equipment combinations!
